languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} kills an enemy, the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Reaper's Resolve is increased by 1 until the end of combat for every kill made by the Reaper.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} mata a un enemigo, su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} aumenta en +1 hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が敵を倒すたび、戦闘が終了するまで、ブレードダンサーの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1増加する。

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}击杀一名敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}都会提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} tue un ennemi, sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} est augmentée de +1 jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} einen Gegner tötet, wird seine {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +1 erhöht.
